description: This file defines the main game screen component for a Tic-Tac-Toe game app, managing game state, UI rendering, user interactions, and AI moves.

methods.name: GameScreen
methods.description: Main functional component for the game screen, handling game logic, UI, and interactions.

methods.name: cell
methods.description: Renders an individual cell of the game board.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board and sets the initial turn.

methods.name: onNewRound
methods.description: Starts a new round with a randomly selected first player.

methods.name: onRestartMatch
methods.description: Restarts the entire match, resetting scores and board.
